PrecisANNUITIES TO SURVIVORS PENSIONS DES SURVIVANTES . Granting of a lifelong annuity to REBECCA MACKOFF, survivor of The Hon. Albert Abraham Mackoff, a retired Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, commencing on August 5, 2007.

precis:
ANNUITIES TO SURVIVORS
PENSIONS DES SURVIVANTES
.
Granting of a lifelong annuity to REBECCA MACKOFF, survivor of The Hon. Albert Abraham Mackoff, a retired Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, commencing on August 5, 2007.
